parameters: I have no reason to go in here.

\n<Genko>Drakul! The superior creature when faced with the human, yet the fools deem themselves fit to attack our country! If you ask me it's only a matter of time before those monsters make their way to even a remote village like here..

\n<Genko>What does your father know of battle??? Of GLORY?? Of protecting a home while it falls around you?? No no my newest soldier! I simply won't have it! I am owed at least one last day of training you and I will make sure you understand my reason for being here!
\n<Matsuki>(Don't punch him. He has a sword. Smile and wave. Leave. Deal with him later.)
Genko I have other things to do today!
Genko I have other things to do today!
\n<Genko>Like what?? Writing peace talks with your father? Or making kitchen knives with Tolkien?? Fine then leave me! I can handle being alone, I thrive in it! I alone will be prepared!
\n<Genko>I’m not blind! Eyeballs or not I could see you in the forge! At least you knew better than to say anything then. Can you believe it??
\n<Matsuki>Most of the people here can’t hold a sword, let alone use one.
\n<Genko>Ugh! Back in my day everyone knew how to use a sword!!!
\n<Matsuki>Wouldn’t the town stop being a paradise if we were constantly training on edge for someone or something coming to destroy us all?
\n<Matsuki>Genko please, we are safe here.. I don’t know what happened to get you so angry but-
\n<Genko>Damn right you don’t know!! None of you sniveling brats do!! Leave me!
\n<Genko>Damn right! At least one person in this town agrees...You’d make a fine soldier Matsuki, I hope you don’t disappoint me.
\n<Shiori>Such a beautiful sight in front of me.
\n<Shiori>I wish we could go on a picnic in the woods.. It’s so beautiful there.
It’s too dangerous! Not after last time!
I’ll slay any danger that comes!
Why not have dinner at the tavern?
It’s too dangerous! Not after last time!
\n<Shiori>We were so little Matsu! It’s ok now-
\n<Matsuki>I won’t put you in danger again!!!
\n<Matsuki>I’m going to be an adult soon. That means it’ll be my job to help the village. And I can’t- I won’t put you in danger again.
\n<Shiori>We can eat at your mom’s tavern then?
I’ll slay any danger that comes!
\n<Shiori>Oh? I thought it was Tobi that was named after the Patron God of soldiers?
\n<Matsuki>I've been training hard for months now. I can protect you this time.
\n<Shiori>Matsu you protected me just fine that time..
\n<Matsuki>It was my idea to go into the forest!! And we were only safe because of your magic..
\n<Matsuki>You don’t even have to say anything..I know it was my fault.. (how could you ever love me after I put you in danger?)
\n<Shiori>I had always been afraid to enter that forest.
\n<Shiori>My parents warned me about it, and I was afraid there might be humans there ready to eat me.
\n<Shiori>But on that day you looked so excited! How could I not go with you?
\n<Shiori>And when the giant wasp attacked us? You tried to protect me, even when you knew no magic. Then too, you made me feel brave enough to fight back.
\n<Shiori>You don’t think much of yourself sometimes Matsu, but there’s just something about you that’s always made me feel like I’m better or stronger than I am.
\n<Shiori>So none of this blaming yourself anymore! Especially since you’re so strong now~ Will you protect me Matsu?
Why not have dinner at the tavern?
\n<Matsuki>It isn’t as…(romantic? Can I say romantic??? So much back in forth I don’t know what to call it!!!)
\n<Matsuki>The tavern is also a wonderful place to eat, I could cook you something...
\n<Shiori>That’s right you’re learning your mother’s recipes aren’t you? If you don’t mind cooking I think I’d love to have dinner with you!
\n<Matsuki>(What would it be? Is it a date? Do I pick flowers? Do I GROW flowers??? What are the steps??? I SKIPPED THE TUTORIAL FOR THIS!!!
\n<Shiori>I think we should wait a few days though, you should focus on apprenticing.
\n<Shiori>Matsu..I’m not going anywhere. We have all the time in the world, don’t we?
\n<Matsuki>(Holy Shienna thank you for this!!) You’re right.
\n<Matsuki>I know, that’s why I gave it.
\n<Shiori>I...well then I’ll be sure to cherish it. It’s not everyday a girl receives something from such a wonderful person.
\n<Shiori>You're wonderful Matsu. I hope that never changes..
\n<Shiori>You'd have to at least take me out to dinner first~
\n<Matsuki> (I don't have anything good enough to give Shiori!!!)
\n<Shiori>Do you think you could wait a few days for me Matsu? I’m actually...preparing something for your day of choosing. If it pleases you...ask me out then. You might like the answer..
The following text for the day is completely optional and won't affect favor or the ending. This is purely for those who want to experience every text branch.
